title: [管理]FastCraft+ ——更好的合成 [1.10/1.7.2]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 19:39 编辑 

楼主没事在bukkit上玩♂耍所以不小心看到了FastCraft+"更好的合成+"(表示只是更好的合成2)
较大部分为小学知识翻译所以多多见谅

好了进入话题！

因为作者已经更新到了1.10而且这个插件的作者很久没更新于是我来！










  屎弟夫:这个插件有啥用？可以吃么？
  这个插件可以更快的合成但是仅仅限于1.7.2和1.10这两个版本
由于楼主家的电脑不能开1.7.2的客户端所以截不图了……
官方只有一张



原文:

[size=123.1%]

 [size=123.1%]This page's description is no longer being maintained. For an up to date description, and sooner updates, go to SpigotMC

FastCraft+ redefines crafting in Minecraft. This plugin is the successor to FastCraft, rewritten from the ground up.
With FastCraft+, users will have a faster method of crafting available to them. When a crafting table is opened, instead of the usual 3x3 crafting grid, the player will be shown the FastCraft+ user interface. Within the interface, players will be shown all of the items that can be crafted from the items within their inventory. To craft an item, all a user has to do is click on an item in the FastCraft+ interface, and the item will be crafted automatically.


Plugin Requirements

Java 7 or newerCraftBukkit/Spigot for Minecraft 1.7+
Plugin Usage

Right click a crafting table to bring up the FastCraft+ interface, with all craftable itemsHover your cursor over a craftable item to see the items required to craft itClick an item for it to be crafted, and automatically added to your inventoryUse the next and previous page buttons to navigate through the pages of craftable itemsClick the Crafting/Armor/Fireworks buttons to craft different kinds of itemsClick the refresh button to reorganize the items in the interfaceClick the crafting table button to show a normal crafting gridClick the crafting multiplier button to change how many times items will be crafted
GitHub

The source to FastCraft+ is hosted on GitHub:Repository - Releases - Milestones - Commits - Issues

If you wish to support me in the development of FastCraft+, please consider donating
A lot of time goes into developing, a donation would mean a lot. Thank you!
给作者捐钱！为了作者不要为我！

[spoiler]

翻译:

[spoiler]fastcraft+重新制作在Minecraft。这个插件继承了fastcraft，改写从新的来。 
此页面的描述不再被更新。一个迄今为止描述，和更快的更新，去spigotmc cǐ此   yè页   miàn面   de的   miáo描   shù述   bù不   zài再   bèi被   wéi维   hù护   。   yī一   gè个   qì迄   jīn今   wéi为   zhǐ止   miáo描   shù述   ，   hé和   gèng更   kuài快   dī的   gēng更   xīn新   ，   qù去   s   p   i   g   o   t   m   c   FastCraft+ redefines crafting in Minecraft. This plugin is the successor to FastCraft, rewritten from the ground up.f   a   s   t   c   r   a   f   t   +   chóng重   xīn新   zhì制   zuò作   zài在   M   i   n   e   c   r   a   f   t   。   zhè这   ge个   chā插   jiàn件   shì是   jì继   chéng承   f   a   s   t   c   r   a   f   t   ，   gǎi改   xiě写   cóng从   dì地   shàng上   pá爬   qǐ起   lái来   。   With FastCraft+, users will have a faster method of crafting available to them. When a crafting table is opened, instead of the usual 3x3 crafting grid, the player will be shown the FastCraft+ user interface. Within the interface, players will be shown all of the items that can be crafted from the items within their inventory. To craft an item, all a user has to do is click on an item in the FastCraft+ interface, and the item will be crafted automatically.与fastcraft +，用户将拥有更快的制作提供给他们的方法。当制作表打开，而不是通常的3x3的各具特色的网格，玩家将要显示的fastcraft +玩家界面。在接口内，玩家将显示所有的项目，可以从他们的背包内的项目制作。制作一个项目，所有玩家需要做的是点击一个项目在fastcraft +

很重要的配置！
配置实际上没有！我还是那句话给作者捐点钱！不要为我！我只是想当一个像籽岷的好人……虽然不可能但是我会努力搬运大量对各位有好处的好插件！


汉化板块请一位大大汉化一下，因为楼主没有1.10的服务端和客户端1.7.2的又是因为电脑不支持1.7.2的所以无法汉化与截图
                
                       拒绝伸手党！
  为了关怀作者所以暂时不会将插件发到论坛，请在原帖下载，并给作者给点钱(有钱捐钱，有人捐人气[不是给我加人气而是给作者！])
